mumbai.about: Mumbai is the capital city of the Indian state of Maharashtra.
mumbai.howToReach: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport is the main airport in Mumbai.
reviews: Mumbai is a great city to visit.
The street food in Mumbai is amazing.

delhi.about: Delhi is the capital city of India.
delhi.howToReach: Indira Gandhi International Airport is the main airport in Delhi.
reviews: Delhi is a great place to shop.

bangalore.about: Bangalore is the capital city of the Indian state of Karnataka.
bangalore.howToReach: Kempegowda International Airport is the main airport in Bangalore.
reviews: Bangalore is known as the Silicon Valley of India.

jaipur.about: Jaipur is the capital city of the Indian state of Rajasthan.
jaipur.howToReach: Jaipur International Airport is the main airport in Jaipur.
reviews: Jaipur is known as the Pink City.

lucknow.about: Lucknow is the capital city of the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
lucknow.howToReach: Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport is the main airport in Lucknow.
reviews: Lucknow is known for its Nawabi culture.
Lucknow is famous for its kebabs.
